topic.title: Example 9â€”Writable External Web Table with Script

body.p: Creates a writable external web table, campaign_out, that pipes output data received by the segments to an executable script, to_adreport_etl.sh:=# CREATE WRITABLE EXTERNAL WEB TABLE campaign_out (LIKE campaign) EXECUTE '/var/unload_scripts/to_adreport_etl.sh' FORMAT 'TEXT' (DELIMITER '|');
